monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Pulls player towards a grappling anchor
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Whenever this Monster gets a Charge stack, share it with another Monster in your party.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Blinding Sparks
skills.description: Unique Aura: There is a chance to apply Blind to enemies when they take Burn damage (40%) or Shock damage (20%).

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Charging Shield
skills.description: Shield self for 60 when receiving a Charge stack.

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Defense Focus
skills.description: Defense from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Defense Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Defense Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Defense value.

skills.name: Disease Control
skills.description: Receive 4% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Electric Field
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Shock on the attacker.

skills.name: Electrify
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Shock.

skills.name: Encapsulate
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (40 + 15% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (80% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (50 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (100% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (60 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (120% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (70 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (150% Max Mana)

skills.name: Encapsulate Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 9 x (90 + 20% Magic) Shield target for 1 x (200% Max Mana)

skills.name: Fatal Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Poison, Burn and Congeal damage dealt to enemies is increased by 20%.

skills.name: Fire Resistance
skills.description: Fire damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Hades
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies, every hit has a 20% chance to apply Poison (Debuff) or Burn (Debuff).

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Hex
skills.description: Every hit has a 7.5% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Hexing Support
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, apply a random Debuff on a random enemy.

skills.name: Intelligent Swarm
skills.description: Aura: Whenever an Insect or Construct Monster in the party applies a Buff or a Debuff, it gains a Charge stack.

skills.name: Ion Beam
skills.description: 9 x 60% (540%) magical damage (wind) Every hit has a 15% chance to apply a random Debuff.

skills.name: Kindle
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gets a Charge stack, share it with another Monster in your party.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Meditation
skills.description: Whenever this Monster spends a turn without attacking an enemy, it gains 6 Charge stacks.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Protect
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 3 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 2
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 4 x (80 + 25% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 3
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 5 x (90 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 4
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 6 x (100 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protect Lvl 5
skills.description: Redirects the next attack on target ally to this Monster. Shield self for 7 x (130 + 20% Defense)

skills.name: Protected Offense
skills.description: Aura: While under the effect of a Shield, Monsters in the party deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Healing actions also remove 4 harmful Stacks (Bleed, Wound, Blind, Tether). Multi-Target-Heals remove 2.

skills.name: Replenish
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (300 + 50% Magic) Shield all for 2 x (350 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Saboteur's Shield
skills.description: Apply Shield equal to 50% of own defense when applying a Debuff.

skills.name: Slime Shot
skills.description: 4 x 35% (140%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 50% (250%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Slime Shot Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (earth) Applies Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Solar Burst
skills.description: 1 x 170% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 105% (210%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Solar Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Spark Shower
skills.description: 6 x 20% (120%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 2
skills.description: 6 x 30% (180%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 40% (240%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 4
skills.description: 7 x 45% (315%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Spark Shower Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 60% (420%) magical damage (fire) cannot be dodged

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Non-critical hits deal 20% more damage.

skills.name: Sticky Threads
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (neutral) applies 2 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Threads Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Threads Lvl 3
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (neutral) applies 3 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Web
skills.description: 2 x 115% (230%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies a stack of Tether.

skills.name: Sticky Web Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 140% (280%) magical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies, applies 2 stacks of Tether.

skills.name: Tri-Mage Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Burn, Chill or Poison to a random enemy.

skills.name: Wind Weakness
skills.description: Wind damage increased by 50%
